document.discussion_title: Gem Diamonds Limited’s (GEMD) Buy Rating Reiterated at FinnCap
document.topic_text: Tweet FinnCap reiterated their buy rating on shares of Gem Diamonds Limited (LON:GEMD) in a research report report published on Wednesday. FinnCap currently has a GBX 216 ($2.78) price target on the stock, down from their prior price target of GBX 270 ($3.48). A number of other research firms also recently issued reports on GEMD. Barclays PLC boosted their price target on shares of Gem Diamonds Limited from GBX 140 ($1.80) to GBX 180 ($2.32) and gave the stock an overweight rating in a research note on Thursday, May 5th. Panmure Gordon reissued a buy rating and issued a GBX 182 ($2.34) price target on shares of Gem Diamonds Limited in a research note on Wednesday, August 10th. JPMorgan Chase & Co. lowered their price target on shares of Gem Diamonds Limited from GBX 204 ($2.63) to GBX 160 ($2.06) and set an overweight rating for the company in a research note on Monday, July 4th. Royal Bank Of Canada reissued an outperform rating and issued a GBX 170 ($2.19) price target on shares of Gem Diamonds Limited in a research note on Monday, June 6th. Finally, Liberum Capital reissued a buy rating and issued a GBX 190 ($2.45) price target on shares of Gem Diamonds Limited in a research note on Tuesday, May 17th. Three research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and seven have given a buy rating to the company’s stock. The company currently has an average rating of Buy and an average price target of GBX 169 ($2.18). In related news, insider A Allan sold 16,456 shares of the business’s stock in a transaction dated Friday, June 3rd. The shares were sold at an average price of GBX 132 ($1.70), for a total transaction of £21,721.92 ($27,970.54). Shares of Gem Diamonds Limited ( LON:GEMD ) opened at 122.92 on Wednesday. The stock has a 50 day moving average price of GBX 127.10 and a 200 day moving average price of GBX 125.38. Gem Diamonds Limited has a 52 week low of GBX 94.75 and a 52 week high of GBX 148.00. The firm’s market capitalization is GBX 169.63 million. Gem Diamonds Limited is a United Kingdom-based diamond producer, which is engaged in the exploration and development of diamond mines. The Company operates diamond mining operations in Lesotho and Botswana. The Company’s geographical segments include Lesotho, which is involved in diamond mining activities; Botswana, which is engaged in diamond mining activities; Belgium, which is involved in the sales, marketing and manufacturing of diamonds, and British Virgin Islands (BVI), Republic of South Africa (RSA) and the United Kingdom, which provides technical and administrative services. Gem Diamonds Limited Gem Diamonds Limited
